kszucs commented on issue #6671: ARROW-8167: [CI] Add support for skipping builds with skip pattern in pull request title
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6671#issuecomment-602528795
 
 
   > I'll consider how to implement this by commit message instead of pull request title.
   > Please wait a while.
   
   My findings are:
   - The push event gives the commit message, but this event only happens when someone directly pushes to a branch. We always want to run CI on master or any other `maint-*` branch, so we shouldn't skip any builds on push event.
   - The pull request event is triggered when a commit arrives to an active pull request, but the pull request event's payload doesn't contain the commit's message, only the sha.
   
   We can use the sha in two ways:
   1. Create a script which queries the API and halts the build it the skip pattern is present. 
      **Drawback:** the builds would be still triggered whereas using the `if: ` expression for a job doesn't even try to run the build if the expression evaluates to false.
   2. Create a build where we solely check that condition using the same script and make the rest of the jobs dependent on it with the [needs options](https://help.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions#jobsjob_idneeds).
     **Drawback**: All of our builds would be triggered with a delay equal to the build time of the skip pattern checker, which means even more builds and slower triggering.
   
   For developing new builds temporarily adding the skip pattern to the pull requests title seems like a good compromise to me.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

fields.description: Github actions doesn't support to skip builds marked as [skip ci] by default.
fields.summary: [CI] Add support for skipping builds with skip pattern in pull request title
